resources.string: Jedi like powers at your finger tips.
We got your back, ask us anything car related\n and we will have it sorted.
Get support when you need it most.

A number of major, overarching privacy regulations have been made law in the last few years, and they’re not restricted to single nations. One of these regulations covers 28 countries, some apply to two or three countries, and one was developed by one state (California) but manages to apply to the entire USA.The most significant regulation is the EU’s (European Union’s) General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), which came into effect in May of 2018 and quite rigorously secures the confidentiality of the personal information of all those in the 28 EU countries. It’s 88 pages long and goes further than any other regulation to establish a safe online environment for consumers.Australia’s Privacy Act of 1988 was drafted before information technology was a major threat to personal privacy. However, its principles still apply today and the letter of the law has been updated to reflect current conditions.
Glad you joined Wheels! Add your vehicle to unlock its full potential!

string-array.name: answers
string-array.item: There are two images on vehicle page which can be used for remote lock/unlock vehicle
Click on the triagular button on the top of vehicle image on Vehicle page.\nIt will alllow you to call our road side assistance team.
Go to the Accounts page.\nThen select the Settings icon.\nUser can see a remove vehicle option which can be used
Go to the Accounts page.\nThen select the Settings icon.\nUser can see a Units of Measurement option to toggle between the units.
Go to the Accounts page.\nThen select the Edit Profile icon.\n
Navigate to the Vehicle page.\nUser will be provided with Tirepressure details,fuel level,oil life,odometer reading and distance to empty.
Go to the Accounts page.\nThen select the Settings icon.\nUser can click on Terms and Privacy to go through details.
